title: Ramen
description: A comforting Japanese noodle soup with a flavorful broth, noodles, soft-boiled eggs, and sliced pork.
instructions: Warm the broth in a pot and add soy sauce, grated ginger, and crushed garlic. Let it simmer for 10 minutes to deepen the flavor.
In a separate pot, cook the ramen noodles according to the package instructions, then drain well.
Prepare soft-boiled eggs by boiling them for 6 minutes, then cooling them in ice water and peeling carefully.
Add the cooked noodles to serving bowls and pour the hot broth over them.
Top each bowl with sliced pork, a soft-boiled egg cut in half, and chopped green onions.
Let the ingredients warm through for 1 minute before serving.
